casebody.data:
BANK
v.
BEST & BEST. No. 494PA05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 3, 2006. John C. Hunter, John J. Korzen, for Blue Ridge Savings Bank, Inc.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 28th day of December 2005 by Defendant for extension of time to file response to Petition for Writ of Certiorari:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of January 2006."
